onset.Description: Event onset in seconds relative to first volume of imaging dataset; i.e. without accounting for later deletion of dummy volumes

Levels.endOfRun: End of run event / fade back to menu
End of run event / fade back to menu
End of run event / fade back to menu

Levels.S[A-Z][0-9]{2}: Specific stimulus ID where the first 2 letters indicate: SF=stimulus face or SO=stimulus object. The latter 2 digits indicate the specific ID of the stimulus.
Levels.endOfRun: End of run event / fade back to menu

Levels.TruePositive: Hits. Probed face or object stimulus reported as seen
Levels.FalseNegative: Misses. Probed face or object stimulus reported as unseen
Levels.TrueNegative: Correct rejection. Blank stimulus correctly reported as unseen
Levels.FalsePositive: False alarm. Blank stimulus incorrectly reported as seen
Levels.endOfRun: End of run event / fade back to menu
